pageContent: Objective: To evaluate enhanced transrectal ultrasound (E-TRUS) techniques including real-time sonoelastography (RTE) and contrast-enhanced transrectal ultrasound (CE-TRUS) for prostate cancer (PCa) detection in men with elevated prostate-specific antigen (PSA) serum levels.

metaData.source:
Association between Lesion Location and Oncologic Outcomes after Focal Therapy for Localized Prostate Cancer Using Either High Intensity Focused Ultrasound or Cryotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33890485/
